p: The study is grounded in Reception Theory and Hall’s ( 1978) Encoding and Decoding Model, Two-Step Flow theory and the Uses and Gratification Theory. Communication is a complex process with the audiences attaching meaning to media content either conforming or opposing the producer’s programmed meaning (Hall 1978). Fourie ( 2001:244) states that ‘Reception Theory investigates “readers” theoretical and empirical process of interpreting media texts’. Informed by this theory, the study investigated the meaning communal farmers attach to media content and its influence on their farming practices. Also fundamental in the process is Hall’s ( 1978) Encoding and Decoding Model.
